text: Hey! You should donate part of your payment to the charity Save the Children.
What does Save the Children do?
They help educate needy kids and help them with health care costs.
That sounds like a good education. I will donate $1.
Awesome! The children will greatly benefit from that help!
Fantastic! I hope they do! Is it for children in the US or other countries?
It's a worldwide charity. One of the places they work is Syria, helping children who have been victims of all the terrible violence over there.
Oh yes! It is horrible there! I hate to see and hear all that is going on!
Yeah, there are so many needy children in the world. I wish there was more we could do to help.
Absolutely! But every little bit helps!
Right! If you want to learn more about the charity, their website is  URL
Thank you very much. I will check that out!
I'm glad you decided to donate to the charity. It's definitely a worthwhile cause.
Me too. Are you passionate about any other charities?
I'm a strong supporter of animal rights charities. What we do to them is just monstrous.
I agree. I am very passionate about animal rights as well.
I always wish there was more we could do to fix all the problems in the world. Charities are great, but there's always so much more to be done.
It gives me hope knowing there are good people who care!
Same here! The world's looking rough these days, so it's nice to see people who are trying to make things better.
Yes indeed! It's horrible what people do to each other!! There are more of us good people than bad people...I like to think :)!
